con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="http://ubaranqa.pl/gablota" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:sch="http://ubaranqa.pl/gablota" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://ubaranqa.pl/gablota"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://ubaranqa.pl/gablota" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="GetCollectibleDetailsRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetCollectibleDetailsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="CollectibleDetails" type="tns:CollectibleDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetAllCollectiblesDetailsRequest"> <xs:complexType></xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="GetAllCourseDetailsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="CourseDetails" type="tns:CollectibleDetails"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsRequest"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsResponse"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="tns:Status"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:simpleType name="Status"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SUCCESS"/> <xs:enumeration value="FAILURE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="CollectibleDetails"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="GetCollectibleDetailsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetCollectibleDetailsRequest" name="GetCollectibleDetailsRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:DeleteCollectibleDetailsResponse" name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetCollectibleDetailsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetCollectibleDetailsResponse" name="GetCollectibleDetailsResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetAllCollectiblesDetailsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetAllCollectiblesDetailsRequest" name="GetAllCollectiblesDetailsRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="GetAllCourseDetailsResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:GetAllCourseDetailsResponse" name="GetAllCourseDetailsResponse"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:DeleteCollectibleDetailsRequest" name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsRequest"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="GablotaPort"> <wsdl:operation name="GetCollectibleDetails"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetCollectibleDetailsRequest" name="GetCollectibleDetailsRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetCollectibleDetailsResponse" name="GetCollectibleDetailsResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="DeleteCollectibleDetails"> <wsdl:input message="tns:DeleteCollectibleDetailsRequest" name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsRequest"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:DeleteCollectibleDetailsResponse" name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetAllCollectiblesDetails"> <wsdl:input message="tns:GetAllCollectiblesDetailsRequest" name="GetAllCollectiblesDetailsRequest"></wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetAllCourseDetails"> <wsdl:output message="tns:GetAllCourseDetailsResponse" name="GetAllCourseDetailsResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="GablotaPortSoap11" type="tns:GablotaPort"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="GetCollectibleDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="GetCollectibleDetailsRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="GetCollectibleDetailsResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="DeleteCollectibleDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="DeleteCollectibleDetailsResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetAllCollectiblesDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:input name="GetAllCollectiblesDetailsRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="GetAllCourseDetails"> <soap:operation soapAction=""/> <wsdl:output name="GetAllCourseDetailsResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="GablotaPortService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:GablotaPortSoap11" name="GablotaPortSoap11"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/ws"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

con:config.script: for( r in testRunner.results ) log.info "TestStep [" + r.testStep.name + "] finished with status " + r.status
